summary: This bill, the "Ensuring Nationwide Access to a Better Life Experience Act" or "ENABLE Act," amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make certain provisions related to ABLE (Achieving a Better Life Experience) programs permanent. It extends increased contributions to ABLE accounts, modifies the Saver's Credit to include ABLE contributions, and makes permanent the ability to roll over funds from 529 plans to ABLE accounts. The bill's amendments apply to taxable years ending after the date of enactment.
